vote.title: Authorize (1) the Fourth Amendment to the Project Supplemental Agreement with Dallas County for additional paving and drainage improvements on Medical District Drive from Interstate Highway (IH) 35E to Southwestern Medical Avenue; and (2) payment to Dallas County for the City’s share of additional project costs for paving and drainage improvements for Medical District Drive from IH 35E to Southwestern Medical Avenue - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the Fourth Amendment to the Project Supplemental Agreement with Dallas County for additional paving and drainage improvements on Medical District Drive from Interstate Highway (IH) 35E to Southwestern Medical Avenue; and (2) payment to Dallas County for the City’s share of additional project costs for paving and drainage improvements for Medical District Drive from IH 35E to Southwestern Medical Avenue - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
